entry.title: Mistrust In Eastern Cultures
entry.content:
The Gulf War, though having one of the best armies in the middle east Iraq lost, and it lost badly. It did to USA the second time, and once again it lost very badly. The Arabs tried to conquer Israel, a tiny nation that had nothing and they lost, and they lost it bad. Long ago in Tamilnadu, despite being brave and having a disciplined military, the Maruthu bothers lost to the British. China lost to western powers during the Opium wars.

The question here is why? Why do people who are in the East loose to people who are in the West? One reason I can think of is that there is an element of mistrust in the east. Sadam does not trust his generals for the fear that he will be ousted by them. The Arab countries though they are all Islamic nations, they are deeply divided into Wahabi, Shia Islam and so on. During the Maruthu era in Tamilnadu, the Paalayam rulers were in a power struggle and deeply mistrusted each others. All this aided enemy victory.

I did find it recently in the people I opposed, I expected a logical good fight, a debate of ideas, but the other side crumbled. They then I found out deeply mistrusted the people who in-fact came to their aid. They did not respect fellow humans. I, filled with western ideas had an open mind, and they could not deal with it.

We might think of Tamil villages a good place to live, may be it is, but people over there mistrust their neighbors and envy them. A neighbor will go into deep state of depression, hate and envy if one has converted a thatched roof house to one with tiles. He, the neighbor, will do all he can to spread a bad word about him, how that one earned in an illegal way and so on.

Not just in Tamils, I find this deep sense of mistrust in Kerala people too. For a Keralite family is important. If a family is headed by a fool, then all the people in family are foolish too. Let’s say that a girl is a Hindu and she falls in love with a muslim, or say she is a feminist and wants to goto Aiyappan temple, that’s it, if the family head is offended, like goats almost all people in the family will be offended and mistrust the girl. Her life is finished. Or she must listen to the family head and mistrust a muslim boy proposing to her. This type of stupidity I find, makes Malayali’s deeply divided and unprogressive.

I think we in East must be open to ideas, listen to others and try starting to trust people. Yes some trust might fail, some might betray you, but unless one knows that you trust him and have given the full freedom to work, he or she cannot work for you 100% and be productive.

entry.title: A Good Woman Driver
entry.content:
Yesterday as usual around 8PM I think I was driving home from office. The roads I drive are quite dangerous, there are lots and lots of potholes, now someone has filled some of them with sand and seems to have compacted them a bit well, plus you have got these people, Chennai people who do not give a damn about traffic rules. To add to that the street lighting would be awful, most of them would have their headlights turned high beam, sometimes against those bright headlights it would be difficult to see the roads.

Driving in Chennai is not just looking at the road and driving. None follows rules here, some one would cut before you. Overtake you without warning, from the opposite side a scooter or a fast car would over take a tanker despite knowing that it would cause a lot of discomfort to you. You must look at the road, you must look at the eyes, hands, wheels of other vehicles too to determine their next move and drive by it.

To add to the woes you have this Road Transport Officers who are perverts, they make it difficult for men to get license, so there are men who bribe them and get their license and being a pervert they grant license to woman just like that. Because of this people who go in car’s like me, when we spot a woman driver on bike we tend to keep distance. Their driving seems shit, their vehicle could change direction any time, sway from one side of the road to other, brake and so on. You need to get a man drunk to do that feat, woman do it just like that.

To make the matters worst, if you hit a woman, or a bike with a kid on it, or even a bike with a family driven by man, you will be blamed for it no matter who has made the mistake. Woman, kids and family are like cows in India, they can do what ever they want. Cows here shit and urinate on roads, drop their dung, stand on the road unmoving and obstructing traffic and none bothers about them or even complain. If you hit them or shoo away, our priminsters Hindu men, will come out drag you out and beat you, because you have abused the Hindu Goddess Lakshmi. These people of so found of cows, one of their favorite drink is cows urine, it like Coca-Cola here.

Okay with all these in mind, yesterday I was driving behind a woman who was on a blue scooter. Definitely I thought she was a crap driver. She was wearing a red saree, black border with golden silk threads in the black woven into intricate pattern. If she did something stupid and I hit her, possibly she was having an auspicious occasion, and hence she was wearing a rich dress, the people would gather around and blame me like hell. I tried to over take and clear her off my mind, but the bad roads and opposing traffic did not permit that. I maintained my distance from her.

After sometime I notices something strange. Unlike many woman on road, she did not make a mistake, she was driving perfect. She had a blue helmet too that matched her color of her bike. ‘Woman thinking about road safety? Wow!’ I thought. But I persisted, after nearly 5 minutes and 3 kilometers of this tense follow up I was able to over take her. Thank fucking God, I raced away, and no more woman scooterist I saw ahead of me from then on.

With roads filled with crap woman driver, I must clap for this one.

entry.title: Why Rationalist Like Buddhism
entry.content:
One would see rationalist talk ill about almost all religions, but not much against Buddhism. It would look counter intuitive, rationalists are here to slam all religious practices, and why not they slam Buddhism so much? Buddhism was slammed, that too by a rationalist nation China. By the time it slammed Buddhism, this religion had become impure, and was well diverged from in initial teachings. Yes one has the right to be stupid and follow Tibetian Buddhism, but China thought its the duty of the state to teach rationalism to the people and bring them out of their stupidity.

Buddhism has lot of belief that are untrue. They believe in previous and past life, they believe in Karma which is a kind of accounting system that keeps track of ones good and bad deeds and assigns a score (very similar to loyalty score assigned by China to every citizen), Buddhist believe in spirits and so on.

Though Buddhists have got many things wrong, they had invested a lot in psychological studies and had got one thing right. That is they figured out that ones happiness and sadness is not the function of external world, but lies within ones brain. Its very true.

Imagine a man who has a corrosive family, none in his family respect him and they just abuse him. Just imagine Leo Tolstoy, the world knows how his family abused him. So imagine a man like him and he is very sad because of his family. Now imagine he goes to a liquor shop and drinks. His wife, children and relatives are the same, but he finds his sadness disappears and he starts to feel a kind of forgetfulness and happiness. I wonder Tolstoy was a drunk, but writing gave him happiness despite everything around him was pulling him down. As you see from this example these people are able to ignore the sadness and are able to generate happiness. That’s what Buddhism says, it says you r feelings can be detached from the world around you.

People believed that ones happiness and sadness was controlled by God, or some supernatural forces, but Buddhism said that one can manufacture these feelings in ones mind. A trained Buddhist can choose to become sad when he wants to, and can become happy when he wants to. He can observe and comment and debate about himself, a trait very very few in humanity have.

When ever God is knocked off, blind faith is shut down, we rationalist are happy and feel that humanity is one step closer to the truth, and hence we love Buddhism despite all its shortcomings.

entry.title: Great move on Kashmir
entry.content:
It’s really a great move on Kashmir I feel, its really a great one what the Modi government has taken. I hate Modi and the BJP and the RSS for destroying India with Hinduism and with their stupidity in general, but the move was great.

Kashmir is a part of India in every legal way. Pakistan with its misinformation and campaign tried to split Kashmir from India, and it tried to split Punjab from us. They failed. If you see, these states have the great rivers shared by India and Pakistan. Pakistan is terribly afraid about its water supply and don’t want these states been controlled by a power that it considers an enemy. Its a very natural feeling.

Right Timing

If you see things happened at the right time. Now Pakistan is disrespected even by Saudi Arabia, a major money source for Pakistani terror. None knows who controls Pakistan, if its the terrorists, the elected government or the military. Plus Pakistan is failing financially time to time. Even the Chinese who want to encircle India by making Pakistan one of their hit man seems to be giving up. Imagine China pumps investment into Pakistan and its gone without right reason.

Silent China

China has its own Kashmir now, its called Hong Kong. China is trying to integrate Hong Kong into it and India is trying to integrate Kashmir into it. So China can’t speak a lot on this issue. The timing at which India executed this thing is great.

There is a huge Islamic problem for China too. China has relatively peaceful Muslim population in its West, think what will happen if ISI is able to radicalize them like they did to Kashmir, Punjab and Afghanistan and ask money from China for their reduced involvement? If China doesn’t realize it and stop supporting Pakistan, then its a huge problem. So rather than supporting Pak’s, its better for China to keep silent.

India must not loose vigil

Though Pakistan is weak, India must not loose vigil. A terror attack is very cheap. If you have a army, you must train people for years, they must have certain benefits, you must follow United Nations protocol and so on. For a terror attack, nothing needs to be followed. You can do it for few lakhs of rupees. Pakistan can do multiple attacks on India if India is not vigilant. On a longer run these attacks would do nothing, but it might be enough to terrorize people and make them blame the government for taking a wrong move.

We must also look into funding of Islamic trusts, mosques in India, I suspect many could be receiving funding from ISI and other terror organization so that they can use them to brain wash people against India.

We have already let our territory to be used by LTTE and now by Islamic Tamil Terrorists to mount attacks on Srilanka, its a shame for India, technically India is terrorist state, no country has the guts now to call India a terror state, but that does not mean we are not one. We are a country who’s territory is been used to launch attacks on others. We are a terror state and we must curb it to get international respect.

Economy in Doldrums

No nation can be successful in stress and in war time if economy is down. Indian economy is down, our construction sector is gone, our automotive sector has slid, possibly irrecoverable now. SME’s are struggling and many are going down. If Modi hits at PAK and looses Indian economy, then he is a bloody fool.
